title: Arumukha nAthan padam
sahitya:
Arumukha nAthan padam sEruvOrin vEdanai tIrumE


anupallavi

  kOrum aruT-prasAdam koDuttiDum pratApan ArupaDai vIDu tanil sIruDan sirappOn


caraNam    pAril avanukkiNai vEru illAdavAru vAri vazhangum karam IrAruLLa pErALan
sUra paduman vAi vIram pEshina pOdum kAruNyat-tODavanai Eru mayilAkkinOn
